body:
```
$ kubectl describe node xxxx
Name:			xxxx
Role:
Labels:			beta.kubernetes.io/arch=amd64
			beta.kubernetes.io/instance-type=n1-standard-8
			beta.kubernetes.io/os=linux
			failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/region=us-central1
			failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/zone=us-central1-a
			kubernetes.io/hostname=xxxx
			role=app
Annotations:		cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/scale-down-when-unready-disabled=true
			volumes.kubernetes.io/controller-managed-attach-detach=true
Taints:			<none>
CreationTimestamp:	Wed, 30 Aug 2017 11:11:59 -0400
Conditions:
  Type			Status	LastHeartbeatTime			LastTransitionTime			Reason			Message
  ----			------	-----------------			------------------			------			-------
  NetworkUnavailable 	False 	Mon, 01 Jan 0001 00:00:00 +0000 	Wed, 30 Aug 2017 11:12:00 -0400 	RouteCreated 		openshift-sdn cleared kubelet-set NoRouteCreated
  OutOfDisk 		False 	Wed, 11 Oct 2017 09:53:27 -0400 	Tue, 10 Oct 2017 16:21:04 -0400 	KubeletHasSufficientDisk 	kubelet has sufficient disk space available
  MemoryPressure 	False 	Wed, 11 Oct 2017 09:53:27 -0400 	Tue, 10 Oct 2017 16:21:04 -0400 	KubeletHasSufficientMemory 	kubelet has sufficient memory available
  DiskPressure 		False 	Wed, 11 Oct 2017 09:53:27 -0400 	Tue, 10 Oct 2017 16:21:04 -0400 	KubeletHasNoDiskPressure 	kubelet has no disk pressure
  Ready 		True 	Wed, 11 Oct 2017 09:53:27 -0400 	Tue, 10 Oct 2017 19:11:58 -0400 	KubeletReady 		kubelet is posting ready status
Addresses:
  InternalIP:	10.128.0.4
  ExternalIP:	35.192.31.109
  Hostname:	xxxx
Capacity:
 cpu:		8
 memory:	30716976Ki
 pods:		80
Allocatable:
 cpu:		8
 memory:	30614576Ki
 pods:		80
System Info:
 Machine ID:			0fb831b9af0c70629bc60f8366e636c8
 System UUID:			5C45B096-9494-551D-BE08-88BEC8F53702
 Boot ID:			2c9a8fdd-b557-463a-8112-b54ab1b3fa97
 Kernel Version:		3.10.0-693.1.1.el7.x86_64
 OS Image:			CentOS Linux 7 (Core)
 Operating System:		linux
 Architecture:			amd64
 Container Runtime Version:	docker://1.12.6
 Kubelet Version:		v1.7.0+695f48a16f
 Kube-Proxy Version:		v1.7.0+695f48a16f
ExternalID:			6760223460393971340
Non-terminated Pods:		(2 in total)
  Namespace			Name							CPU Requests	CPU Limits	Memory Requests	Memory Limits
  ---------			----							------------	----------	---------------	-------------
  kube-system			prometheus-node-exporter-06b6x				100m (1%)	200m (2%)	30Mi (0%)	50Mi (0%)
  origin-ci			cmd-2-pr-16554-5bd4e131e6ac2120f8c58cde944v2		2500m (31%)	0 (0%)		6656Mi (22%)	8Gi (27%)
Allocated resources:
  (Total limits may be over 100 percent, i.e., overcommitted.)
  CPU Requests	CPU Limits	Memory Requests	Memory Limits
  ------------	----------	---------------	-------------
  2600m (32%)	200m (2%)	6686Mi (22%)	8242Mi (27%)
Events:
  FirstSeen	LastSeen	Count	From				SubObjectPath	Type		Reason			Message
  ---------	--------	-----	----				-------------	--------	------			-------
  12m		12m		1	kubelet, xxxx			Normal		NodeNotSchedulable	Node xxxx status is now: NodeNotSchedulable
```

Once that event expires I'm fairly certain I would have no idea that the node is cordoned.

title: Node describe does a terrible job at telling me that the node is cordoned
